Jr. Executive/Asst. Executive (Welfare) : Next Accessories Ltd. Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Next Accessories Ltd. Jr. Executive/Asst. Executive (Welfare) Application Deadline : 26 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Company Information Summary Vacancy: 01 Age: 23 to 35 years Location: Narayanganj (Rupganj) Salary: Negotiable Published: 27 Jan 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 23 to 35 years Responsibilities & Context To establish regular communication and consultation mechanisms to maintain harmonious industrial relations between factory management and workers. To represent and escalate individual and collective worker grievances to management and facilitate their prompt and fair resolution. To understand workers’ perspectives and support both management and workers in resolving issues through mutual understanding, cooperation, and constructive dialogue. To monitor industrial relations proactively and, in the event of any dispute, use influence and mediation skills to support amicable settlement through joint consultation. To address wages, employment conditions, and related matters through joint discussions with management and recognized worker representatives. To promote healthy and effective labor–management practices within the factory. To coordinate closely with the factory medical officer to ensure improved healthcare services and appropriate medical support for workers. To encourage the formation and effective functioning of work committees, joint production committees, cooperative societies, and welfare committees, and to oversee their activities. To ensure the availability and proper maintenance of worker amenities, including dining facilities, crèche services, clean and adequate sanitation facilities, and safe drinking water. To assist management in administering leave with wages and to explain relevant leave policies and procedures to workers, including guidance on leave applications and authorized absences. To guide female workers on maternity leave procedures and benefits, monitor maternity leave cases, follow up on post-leave return issues, and check on the well-being of workers planning or availing maternity leave. To recommend initiatives aimed at improving working and living conditions and enhancing the overall welfare of workers. To educate and brief workers on occupational health and safety practices, including the use of PPE, machine guarding, sanitation, OSH requirements, and fire safety. To perform any additional duties as assigned by factory management. Skills & Expertise Compliance Compliance Audit Compliance Welfare activities Human Resource Management Social Compliance Employment Status Full Time Gender Only females are allowed to apply. To search for eligibility of a project on the proposed land at RAJUK, CDA, KDA, RDA, CoxDA, PWD etc. To prepare different kinds of Deeds such as MoU, Sale Deed, Purchase Deed, General Power of Attorney, Irrevocable Power of Attorney, Foreign Power, Joint Venture Agreement, Partition Deed, Declaration Deed, Baina Deed, Legal Notice, Cases etc. To take necessary step for Sale Permission from concern Authority and conduct Registration, pre-registration, post-registration of Baina, Sale Deed, Power Deed, Declaration Deed etc. and coordinating with Procurement Team. To collect Certified copy of Deeds from Registry Office, Khatians from DC Office, Mouza Maps from DC/Settlement office and Certified copy of Cases from Courts. To file Mutation application at AC(Land) Office, attend at the Hearing and finally collection of Mutation Khatian and pay land tax. To apply at different government offices for approval of LUC, Lay out plan, Fire, Environmental, PWD, Aviation, Traffic NOC etc. and collection of those NOCs from those Departments. To maintain Register for all Original documents and keep those documents in safe custody. To FIR & GDs to relevant Police Station, Court, and Administrative Body, coordinate and maintain liaison with the Administrative Body & Panel Lawyer. To maintain Case Register and all Case related documents and take follow up of those Cases and update time to time & collect Case related documents from the Court. To scan legal documents and archive those documents properly. Any other job assigned by the management time to time. Skills & Expertise Land Documentation Legal vetting Suggested by Legal Affairs Legal Documentation Legal Drafting Compensation & Other Benefits Mobile bill,T

job_description:
Air Freight Manager (Multinational Company) : A Reputed Logistics and Freight Forwarding Company Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List A Reputed Logistics and Freight Forwarding Company Air Freight Manager (Multinational Company) Application Deadline : 26 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Age: 35 to 40 years Location: Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Published: 28 Jan 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 35 to 40 years Minimum 5–7 years of experience in air freight operations, preferably in a managerial role. Strong understanding of international freight forwarding, airline operations, and customs regulations. Excellent communication, negotiation, and problem‑solving skills. Proficiency in logistics management systems and MS Office applications. Ability to lead teams, work under pressure, and manage multiple priorities. Responsibilities & Context About the Role We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Air Freight Manager to oversee and optimize our air freight operations. The ideal candidate will bring strong industry expertise, excellent leadership capabilities, and a commitment to ensuring the seamless movement of cargo through global air networks. Key Responsibilities Manage day-to-day air freight operations, ensuring efficiency, accuracy, and compliance with global standards. Build and maintain strong relationships with airlines, agents, Clients’ and service partners. Oversee routing, pricing, and capacity planning to maximize profitability and service quality. Ensure accurate documentation, customs compliance, and adherence to regulatory requirements. Lead and mentor the air freight team, fostering a culture of performance, quality, and continuous improvement. Resolve operational issues promptly and maintain high service standards for customers. Collaborate with sales and customer service teams to develop tailored logistics solutions. Monitor key operational KPIs and prepare regular performance reports. Skills & Expertise Freight Forwarding Company Suggested by Freight Forwarding Freight forwarding knowledge Freight Forwarding/ C&F Good Ms office and Emailing skill Compensation & Other Benefits What We Offer
Competitive salary and benefits package
Opportunities for career growth within a global logistics environment
A collaborative and dynamic work culture Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply. Responsibilities & Context Job Summary The Sales Executive is responsible for promoting and selling PVC electrical wire guards to dealers, distributors, contractors, and project customers. The role focuses on expanding market presence, achieving sales targets, maintaining strong customer relationships, and identifying new business opportunities in the electrical and construction segments. Job Responsibilities: Sales & Business Development Promote and sell PVC electrical wire guards to retailers, wholesalers, distributors, builders, electricians, and project clients Identify and develop new customers and markets Achieve monthly and annual sales targets Generate enquiries and convert leads into orders Conduct market surveys to understand demand, competition, and pricing trends Customer Relationship Management Build and maintain strong relationships with existing customers Provide product information, pricing, and technical details to customers Handle customer queries, complaints, and after-sales support Ensure timely collection of payments as per company policy Market & Dealer Management Appoint new dealers and distributors as per company guidelines Support channel partners with promotions, schemes, and product training Monitor stock availability and coordinate with logistics for order fulfillment Reporting & Coordination Prepare daily/weekly sales reports and market feedback Coordinate with marketing, production, and accounts teams Track competitor activities and suggest strategies to improve sales Skills & Expertise Suggested by Business Development Compensation & Other Benefits Pick & Drop facility. Helper : Runner Group Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Runner Group Helper Application Deadline : 10 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: 8 Age: At least 18 years Location: Mymensingh (Bhaluka) Salary: Negotiable Published: 28 Jan 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Additional Requirements Age At least 18 years Responsibilities & Context নির্ধারিত SOP ও মান অনুযায়ী অ্যাসেম্বলি কাজ করা। অ্যাসেম্বলি লাইনের কাজ স্বাভাবিক রাখতে সহায়তা করা। যেকোনো সমস্যা হলে তাৎক্ষণিকভাবে সুপারভাইজারকে জানানো। প্রয়োজন অনুযায়ী বিভিন্ন ধরনের অ্যাসেম্বলি কাজে সহায়তা করা। সুপারভাইজারের নির্দেশনা অনুযায়ী কাজ সম্পন্ন করা। নতুন কাজ শেখার জন্য ট্রেনিং ও মাল্টি-স্কিল কার্যক্রমে অংশ নেওয়া। টিমের সঙ্গে সমন্বয় করে কাজ করে ডাউনটাইম কমানো। গুণগত মান বজায় রেখে উৎপাদন বৃদ্ধিতে সহায়তা করা। নিরাপত্তা নিয়ম মেনে চলা এবং কর্মস্থল পরিষ্কার রাখা। কাজের উন্নয়নের জন্য সুপারভাইজারের ফিডব্যাক অনুসরণ করা। Skills & Expertise Suggested by Welder Operator helper Mig/ Tig Welding QA/ QC Welding Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply. MTO- R&D (Dyeing) Application Deadline : 26 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: 22 to 27 years Location: Dhaka (Savar) Salary: Negotiable Published: 27 Jan 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 22 to 27 years Fresh graduates or candidates with up to 1–2 years of relevant experience in dyeing or R&D. Basic knowledge of textile dyeing processes and color science. Understanding of lab dyeing equipment and testing methods. Analytical and problem-solving skills. Good documentation and reporting abilities. Proficiency in MS Excel and basic lab software. Strong communication and teamwork skills. Willingness to learn and adapt in a fast-paced manufacturing environment. Responsibilities & Context Job Context: AKH Knitting & Dyeing Ltd. Is a 100% knit composite factory. We are looking few MTO for the dyeing- R&D. The Management Trainee Officer (MTO) – R&D Dyeing is responsible for supporting research, development, and process optimization activities in textile dyeing. The role focuses on developing new dyeing processes, improving color quality and consistency, reducing cost and environmental impact, and assisting in scale-up from lab to bulk production. Key Responsibilities Assist in R&D activities related to dyeing of fabrics/yarns using different dye classes (reactive, disperse, vat, sulfur, acid, etc.). Conduct laboratory dyeing trials, shade matching, and recipe development. Analyze dyeing results for color accuracy, fastness properties, and reproducibility. Support bulk trial planning and execution based on lab-developed recipes. Monitor dyeing parameters such as temperature, pH, time, liquor ratio, and chemical usage. Document experimental data, test results, and standard operating procedures (SOPs). Assist in troubleshooting dyeing issues related to shade variation, unevenness, and fastness failures. Coordinate with production, quality, and merchandising teams for new developments. Support sustainability initiatives by working on water, chemical, and energy optimization. Keep up to date with new dyes, chemicals, and dyeing technologies. Follow safety, health, and environmental (SHE) guidelines in all R&D activities. Skills & Expertise Suggested by Garments Industry Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Dhaka (Savar) Company Information AKH Knitting & Dyeing Ltd. job_title: Threshing Operator - Green Leaf Threshing Plant
job_description: Threshing Operator - Green Leaf Threshing Plant : GENUINE LEAF TOBACCO LTD Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List GENUINE LEAF TOBACCO LTD Threshing Operator - Green Leaf Threshing Plant Application Deadline : 17 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: 2 Location: Kushtia Salary: Negotiable Published: 15 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Required Skills & Competencies: Practical knowledge of green leaf threshing process and machinery. Ability to read basic process parameters and production instructions. Troubleshooting skills for mechanical and process-related issues. Teamwork, discipline, and strong attention to detail. Willingness to work in shifts and high-dust industrial environments. Experience: 2–5 years of experience in a green leaf threshing plant or tobacco processing facility. Hands-on experience with threshing lines is highly desirable. Responsibilities & Context Job Purpose: To operate, monitor, and control the green leaf threshing line to ensure efficient separation of tobacco leaf, minimal losses, consistent quality, and safe plant operation according to production targets and quality standards. Key Responsibilities: Operate green leaf threshing machines (feeders, threshers, separators, conveyors, and related equipment) as per standard operating procedures. Monitor leaf flow, moisture level, and feed rate to maintain optimal threshing efficiency and product quality. Adjust machine settings (speed, clearance, airflow) to minimize stem content, fines, and leaf damage. Ensure proper segregation of lamina, stem, and waste according to process requirements. Identify and report abnormal machine behavior, blockages, vibrations, or quality deviations. Perform routine checks, cleaning, and basic preventive maintenance of threshing equipment. Coordinate with upstream (receiving/conditioning) and downstream (drying, redrying, packing) operations for smooth line operation. Maintain production records, downtime logs, and quality-related observations. Follow all safety, fire prevention, and housekeeping (5S) guidelines within the plant. Assist maintenance teams during breakdowns and planned shutdowns. Ensure compliance with company policies, GMP, and occupational health & safety standards. Quality & Safety Responsibilities: Maintain consistent threshing quality as per grade and blend requirements. Prevent cross-contamination and product mixing. Use PPE correctly and follow lockout/tagout procedures when required. Immediately report safety hazards, near misses, or incidents. Employment Status Full Time Job Location Kushtia Company Information GENUINE LEAF TOBACCO LTD Follow Address: DOSMILE, BAHIRCHAR, BHERAMARA,KUSHTIA Report this Job / Company (রিপোর্ট) রিপোর্ট এই চাকরির জন্য

job_description: Programme Organiser, BRAC Education Programme- Social Enterprise : BRAC Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List BRAC Programme Organiser, BRAC Education Programme- Social Enterprise Application Deadline : 26 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Anywhere in Bangladesh Salary: Negotiable Published: 16 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Additional Requirements Bachelor’s degree in any relevant discipline. Fresher’s are encouraged to apply. Strong written and verbal communication skills. Proven capacity to co-facilitate training sessions and refresher workshops. Effective negotiation and influencing skills for constructive engagement with community stakeholders. Proficiency in conducting children's survey skills. Responsibilities & Context BRAC is an international development organisation founded in Bangladesh that partners with over 100 million people living with inequality and poverty globally to create sustainable opportunities to realise potential. Working at BRAC is not like any other job. It is a platform where you can bring about real change for people who need it the most. We are not just dreaming of a better world, we are building it. Join us to find the way. BRAC Education Programme (BEP) has over 38 years of global experience working with governments and successfully running schools focusing on children living in situations of poverty and inequality. In Bangladesh, BEP has graduated 8.10 million children from pre- primary (56.81% girls; 212,275 children with disabilities; 91,424 ethnic children) and 6.31 million out of school children from primary level (64.57% girls; 69,502 children with disabilities; and 145,875 ethnic children) since its inception in 1985. In addition, BRAC has previously worked on Life Skills Based Education (LSBE) with 1.08 million adolescent members (69% girls) through Adolescent Development Programme (ADP) centres. In our relentless pursuit of educational excellence, the BRAC Education Programme (BEP) has introduced Social Enterprise (SE) schools, representing sustainable frugal innovations tailored for families willing and capable of paying school fees. These schools epitomize our commitment to providing enhanced educational experiences, boasting higher qualified teachers, enriched curricula, digital resources, and superior infrastructural facilities. Job Purpose: The person will be responsible for organizing activities for establishing a Social Enterprise as a self-sustained programme and maintaining learning quality. Key Responsibilities: School Operations: Conduct surveys for school openings and manage all procedures for establishing and maintaining schools. শিথিল যোগ্য জাতীয় পর্যায়ের ক্ষুদ্রঋণ প্রতিষ্ঠানে ঋণ কর্মসুচিতে কমপক্ষে ১০ বছর এবং এরিয়া ম্যানেজার পদে ন্যূনতম ০৩ বছরের অভিজ্ঞতা থাকতে হবে। কমপক্ষে ০৫ টি ব্রাঞ্চ এবং ২০.০০ কোটি টাকা ঋণস্থিতি পরিচালনায় দক্ষতা থাকতে হবে। MS- Office এবং Microfin360 পরিচালনায় দক্ষতা থাকতে হবে। Responsibilities & Context অফিস ব্যবস্থাপনা কর্মী ব্যবস্থাপনা ও তহবিল ব্যবস্থাপনার সুষ্ঠ বাস্তবায়ন করতে হবে। সংস্থার নীতিমালা অনুযায়ী ঋণ ও সঞ্চয় কার্যক্রম পরিচালনার সকল কাজ বাস্তবায়ন করতে হবে। ঋণ কর্মসূচীর বাৎসরিক পরিকল্পনা তৈরী ও সে অনুযায়ী ত্রৈমাসিক মাসিক ও সাপ্তাহিক লক্ষ্যমাত্রা অর্জন নিশ্চিত করা। কর্ম-এলাকা সম্প্রসারণের ক্ষেত্রে কার্যকরী উদ্যোগ নেয়ার অভিজ্ঞতা থাকতে হবে। প্রতিদিন সমিতি পরিদর্শনকে অগ্রাধিকার দিয়ে সমিতির কালেকশনশীট, নতুন সদস্য ভর্তি, সঞ্চয় ফেরত, অগ্রীম আদায়, পূর্ণ পরিশোধ, ঋণী যাচাই, প্রকল্প ফলোআপ, পাশবই যাচাই, সংস্থার প্রতি সদস্যদের আনুগত্যতা, কর্মীর কার্যকলাপ ইত্যাদি যাচাইসহ খেলাপি আদায়ে অভিজ্ঞতা থাকতে হবে। বিএম এর দৈনিক কাজের মনিটরিংসহ নিয়মিত অন লাইন ও অফ লাইন মনিটরিং করা, মনিটরিং রেজিস্টার লিখা, পরবর্তীতে ফলোআপ করে ফিডব্যাক দেয়া। ব্রাঞ্চ পরির্দশনের সময় ব্রাঞ্চে এক রাত্রি অবস্থান করবেন। সকলের গতিবিধি লক্ষ্য রাখা, অনিয়ম চিহ্নিত করার চেষ্টা করা, মাঠ ও অফিস পর্যায়ের এআইএস ও এমআইএস চেক করা, ব্রাঞ্চের অগ্রগতি মূল্যায়ন করা, কোন কর্মী পিছিয়ে থাকলে তার দুর্বলতা কাটিয়ে উঠার জন্য পরামর্শ প্রদান, মনিটরিং-এ উদঘাটিত সমস্যা নিয়ে মিটিং করা ও গৃহীত সিদ্ধান্ত বাস্তবায়নের জন্য পদক্ষেপ গ্রহণকরা, অনুমোদনবিহীন কোন ঋণ বিতরণ ও খরচ হয়েছে কিনা তা যাচাই করে প্রয়োজনীয় ব্যবস্থ্য গ্রহণ করার অভিজ্ঞতা থাকতে হবে। অটোমেশনের এমআইএস ও এআইএস নিজে জানা এবং অন্যকে শেখানোর মত জ্ঞান রাখা। ব্রাঞ্চে অটোমেশনের কাজ চেক করা, ভুল পাওয়া গেলে সংশোধনের ব্যবস্থা নেয়া। চিঠি লিখা, ফরমেট তৈরি ও ই-মেইল আদান প্রদানসহ কম্পিউটার সম্পর্কে ভাল জ্ঞান রাখতে হবে। ক্যাশে ও ব্যাংকে অতিরিক্ত টাকা অলস পড়ে আছে কিনা, অতিরিক্ত টাকা পড়ে থাকলে তা বিতরণের পরিকল্পনা করা অন্যথায় প্রধান কার্যালয়ে টাকা প্রেরণের ব্যবস্থা নেয়া এবং ব্রাঞ্চ ম্যানেজারকে টাকা অলস ফেলে রাখার জন্য ব্যাখ্যা চাওয়া। কর্মীদের সবল ও দুর্বল দিক চিহ্নিত করা। কর্মীদের মান উন্নয়নের ব্যাপারে প্রয়োজনীয় ব্যবস্থা গ্রহণ করা। ম্যানুয়েল, সার্কুলার, নিয়মকানুন ইত্যাদি বিষয়ে কর্মীরা অবগত কিনা যাচাই করা। এরিয়ার আওতাধীন ব্রাঞ্চের বিএম হতে সকল সহকর্মীদের বার্ষিক মূল্যায়ন সম্পাদন করতে হবে। ম্যানুয়াল/সার্কুলার মোতাবেক অনুমোদন ক্ষমতার মধ্যে যাবতীয় ক্রয় ও ব্যয়ের অনুমোদন দিতে হবে। এরিয়া ম্যানেজার তার সার্বিক কর্মকান্ডের জন্য সংশ্লিষ্ট সুপারভা

COMPETENCIES: Facilitating group meetings, managing timelines, oral and written fluency in both Bangla and English, handling critical issues with relevant stakeholders Responsibilities & Context BRAC is an international development organisation founded in Bangladesh in 1972 that partners globally with over 100 million people living with inequality and poverty to create opportunities to realise their potential. This position carries the responsibility of planning, managing, implementing, and monitoring activities at the camp distribution point for various aspects of the shelter project. This includes overseeing stock updates, token distribution, and daily in/out updates to the stock register. Additionally, the role involves managing the camp distribution point, maintaining the filing system, and updating asset data in the database. The incumbent is expected to dedicate 100% of their time to the camp office within their assigned working areas. They will report directly to the Deputy Project Manager of Supply Chain and collaborate with the respective camp focal to fulfil their duties effectively. Receive and issue store materials with proper records in professional manner as well as maintain management wise inventory and delivery sheet separately in Distribution point at camps. Ensure proper maintain and operation of the store, like as the activities of safe receive, storage, retrieval and timely dispatch and maintain register as per the waybill and GRN. Maintain manual register and online inventory software for data recording. Prepare periodic stock report (weekly/monthly/yearly) of distribution point, notification of inventory expiry or damage well before. Maintain accuracy in manual register and inventory software with reference to the receive/dispatch challan. Ensure dumper transport requisition a day before the material delivery at camp distribution point. Maintain FIFO (First in First out) & LEFO (Last Expired First Out) methods as per materials wise. রক্ষণাবেক্ষণ: সঠিক এবং দ্রুত ফলাফল নিশ্চিত করতে ল্যাবের সকল যন্ত্রপাতি ও সরঞ্জামের সঠিক ব্যবহার, মনিটরিং এবং নিয়মিত রক্ষণাবেক্ষণ করা। মান নিয়ন্ত্রণ: পরীক্ষার ফলাফলের নির্ভরযোগ্যতা নিশ্চিত করতে নিয়মিতভাবে মেশিনের ক্যালিব্রেশন এবং কোয়ালিটি কন্ট্রোল চেক করা। নথিপত্র সংরক্ষণ: পরীক্ষার ফলাফল, রিএজেন্ট (Reagent) ব্যবহারের হিসাব, কোয়ালিটি কন্ট্রোল লগ এবং যন্ত্রপাতির রক্ষণাবেক্ষণ সংক্রান্ত সঠিক job_description: Data Collector - DIEM Survey (2600325) : Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations Data Collector - DIEM Survey (2600325) Application Deadline : 26 Feb 2026 Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Dhaka Published: 22 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Responsibilities & Context Organizational Unit: FABGD Job Type: Non-staff opportunities Type of Requisition: PSA (Personal Services Agreement) Grade Level: N/A Primary Location: Bangladesh-Dhaka Reporting Lines The Data Collector – DIEM Survey (SC1) will support field data collection and monitoring under the supervision of the Natural Resources Socioeconomic Specialist and overall guidance of the Assistant FAO Representative (Programme). Technical Focus The position focuses on coordinating and supervising field data collection activities while ensuring strict adherence to project protocols and quality standards. The incumbent will be responsible for organizing and guiding enumerator training, overseeing the collection of both qualitative and quantitative data, and ensuring the completeness, accuracy, and timely submission of all data and reports. Tasks and responsibilities Field Oversight & Support Attend and actively participate in training sessions prior to fieldwork. Organize and oversee enumerator participation and training engagement. Guide enumerators in gathering baseline and monitoring data. Monitor project activities through regular field visits and ensure adherence to protocols. Data Collection & Quality Control Supervise the collection of qualitative and quantitative data, including post-distribution and post-training assessments. Collect agricultural market information as needed and directed. Review data for completeness, accuracy, and consistency before submission. Documentation & Reporting Ensure accurate and timely submission of completed questionnaires, field notes, and other data collection tools. Maintain organized records of all field activities, including attendance, training logs, and consultation summaries. Prepare periodic progress reports summarizing field findings, challenges, and recommendations. Support the documentation of community consultations, stakeholder meetings, and training sessions. Contribute to the development of input/material distribution plans and document implementation processes. Ensure proper archiving of all project-related documents, both physical and digital. Accountability to Affected People (AAP) Inform beneficiaries about the AAP message and feedback mechanisms. Ensure all complaints and feedback from beneficiaries are properly recorded, addressed, and responded to in a timely manner. Support & Logistics

EDOTCO Group operates and manages a regional portfolio of over 47,000 towers across Malaysia, Indonesia, Bangladesh, Cambodia, Sri Lanka, Pakistan, and Philippines. EDOTCO strives to deliver outstanding performance in telecommunications infrastructure services and solutions. Its state-of-the-art real-time monitoring service, echo, has driven significant improvements in field operations while maximizing operational efficiencies in terms of battery, energy and fuel consumption for telecommunications infrastructure. Through our operations in developing Asian economies, the Group has established a strong track record in nation building. EDOTCO has progressively invested in industry best practices, providing a broad portfolio of infrastructure solutions, and offering value-added services to enhance efficiencies and connectivity for communities. We are seeking an experienced and operationally strong leader to oversee performance across assigned Business Circles. This role will ensure high network availability, safety compliance, efficient field operations, and strong vendor governance while maintaining effective collaboration with customers, regulators, and local stakeholders. The incumbent will drive operational excellence by managing site rollout and acquisition activities, handling escalations, ensuring SLA compliance, and maintaining financial control at the circle level. Working closely with central technical and commercial teams, the role will monitor KPIs, improve service performance, and ensure readiness for emergency and crisis situations — strengthening EDOTCO’s reputation as a reliable telecom infrastructure partner nationwide. Additional Support Duties: Perform other duties related to corporate affairs as assigned by the Company Secretary or senior management, ensuring timely execution and confidentiality in all corporate secretarial functions. Application Insights View Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age At most 38 years জি-ব্যাংকারে  অথবা মাইক্রোফিন-360 সফটওয়্যারে নুন্যতম 5 বছরের কাজের অভিজ্ঞতা বাস্তব থাকতে হবে। এমআইএস এআইএস সহ পিকেএসএফ ও এমআরএএর চাহিদা মোতাবেক সকল রিপোর্ট তৈরির বাস্তব অভিজ্ঞতা থাকতে হবে। MS Excel, database Management, এবং Data Analysis এ দক্ষ হতে হবে। 05 বছর যে কোন এনজিও এমআইএস অফিসার হিসাবে কাজ করার অভিজ্ঞতা থাকতে হবে। মোটর সাইকেল চালনায় পারদর্শী এবং বৈধ ড্রাইভিং লাইসেন্স এবং নিজস্ব মোটর সাইকেল থাকতে হবে। অধিকতর যোগ্যতা  সম্পন্ন প্রার্থীদের ক্ষেত্রে শিক্ষাগত যোগ্যতা ও বয়স শিথিলযোগ্য। Responsibilities & Context গণ উন্নয়ন প্রচেষ্টা ১৯৭৩ সাল থেকে জাতীয় পর্যায়ের একটি বেসরকারী উন্নয়ন সংস্থা। সংস্থাটি মাইক্রোক্রেডিট রেগুলেটরী অথিরিটি কর্তৃক সনদপ্রাপ্ত, সনদ নম্বর ০০৭৬৮-০০৬৪৭-০০৪০৩। সংস্থাটি পিকেএসএফ এর অর্থায়নে ঢাকা, গোপালগঞ্জ, মাদারীপুর, ফরিদপুর, শরীয়তপুর, বরিশাল, চট্টগ্রাম, কক্সবাজার জেলার বিভিন্ন উপজেলায় ঋণ কর্মসূচীর শাখা বৃদ্ধির লক্ষ্যে জরুরী ভিত্তিতে উদ্যোমী ও দক্ষ কর্মকর্তা/কর্মচারী নিয়োগের জন্য আগ্রহী প্রার্থীদের নিকট থেকে দরখাস্ত আহবান করছে। প্রধান দায়িত্ব এবং ক্ষমতা বাস্তবায়ন: প্রতিমাসে কর্ম পরিকল্পনা অনুযায়ী শাখা পরিদর্শন করা সফটওয়্যার এর সকল প্রকার কারিগরী সহযোগিতা প্রদান করা। শাখা হিসাবরক্ষকদের প্রশিক্ষণের মাধ্যমে দক্ষ করে গড়ে তোলা। এমআইএস/মাসিক প্রতিবেদন তৈরী করে সংশ্লিষ্ট ডেস্কে প্রেরণ করা। শাখার পারফরমেন্স এর উপর ভিত্তি করে পরিদর্শনকৃত শাখার প্রতিবেদন তৈরী করে সমন্বয়কারী-আইটি কে প্রদান করা। পিকেএসএফ, এমআরএ ও সিডিএফ সহ সকল প্রকার প্রতিবেদন চাহিদা মোতাবেক তৈরি করা। কম্পিউটার ডাটা সমূহ এবং অন্যান্য এমআইএস তথ্য সব সময় আপডেট রাখা। সংস্থার সকল কম্পিউটার এর হার্ডওয়্যার ও সফটওয়্যার এর সচলতা নিশ্চিত করা। Skills & Expertise Suggested by Microcredit Microfinance program Data Management Compensation & Other Benefits বেতন-প্রবেশনকালীন সময়ে সর্বসাকুল্যে 42,০০০/= টাকা। প্রবেশনকাল 06 মাস  সমাপ্ত হলে মূল্যায়ন পরবর্তী সংস্থার নিয়মিত বেতন স্কেলে (গ্রেড-০৯) 47,800/= প্রদান করা হবে । সংস্থার নিয়মিত কর্মী হিসাবে স্থায়ীকরণের পর প্রভিডেন্ট ফান্ড, গ্রাচ্যুইটি , উৎসব ভাতা এবং বৈশাখী ভাতা প্রদান করা হবে। Employment Status Full Time Job Location Faridpur, Madaripur Apply Procedure Hard Copy আগ্রহী প্রার্থীদের পাসপোর্ট সাইজের ২ কপি সদ্য তোলা রঙিন
